channel.title: Power Up, NPC Line Out of Context
channel.description: After you power up and move the train on the turntable, if you go back to the guard in the control room (hey... any good samaritan will TRY to get him out!), he tells you to start it up and offer to turn the table for you, even though he already has.

item.title: Power Up, NPC Line Out of Context
item.dc:creator: RiscIt
item.description:
After you power up and move the train on the turntable, if you go back to the guard in the control room (heyâ€¦ any good samaritan will TRY to get him out!), he tells you to start it up and offer to turn the table for you, even though he already has.
